DOC.brief_summary: To assess functional cosmetic outcome enucleation rectus end-to-end suture surgical technique hydroxyapatite orbital implant
DOC.brief_title: A Modified Orbital Implantation Technique Enucleation
DOC.detailed_description: To assess functional cosmetic outcome enucleation rectus end-to-end suture surgical technique 2005 2009 . All patient underwent primary enucleation implantation non-wrapped HA implant use technique involve draw end rectus muscle anteriorly suture cross-shape front implant . Main outcome measure include occurrence pain discharge , soft tissue problem , implant motility , upper lid position , patient ' satisfaction .
DOC.criteria: bilateral enucleation severely traumatized orbit , little function extraocular muscle adjunctive radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy diabetes vessel inflammation followup le 6 month
